attributes.action: rethink the appointment by the Department for Communities and Local Government of "faith advisers"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The appointment by the Department for Communities and Local Government of 13 "faith advisers" to "advise on the big issues facing society such as the economy, parenting, achieving social justice and tackling climate change" raises the importance of religious opinion above that of any other voice in the public sphere, including that of non-religious individuals - and as such the move should be dramatically rethought or annulled.
